FPC上接连接器_front.jpg.name: FPC Top-Mount Connector
FPC上接连接器_front.jpg.description: A flexible printed circuit (FPC) connector, commonly used to connect displays, cameras, and other modules to the mainboard, providing reliable high-speed signal transmission.
